comment: Obsolete version of ~ spsbim as of 6-Jul-2023. Specialization of implication. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-May-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
